title: 1.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Create a program that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin based on user input. This task teaches the use of if-elif-else statements and functions, encouraging students to write code that performs useful real-world conversions.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
